package.name: ensembl_vep

actions.action: mkdir $INSTALL_DIR/cache; mkdir $INSTALL_DIR/cache/tmp; chmod 777 $INSTALL_DIR/cache; chmod 777 $INSTALL_DIR/cache/tmp; perl scripts/variant_effect_predictor/INSTALL.pl --CACHEDIR $INSTALL_DIR/cache --DESTDIR ./scripts/variant_effect_predictor/ --AUTO a

package.readme:
This package installs the Ensembl Variant Effect Predictor (VEP) and its dependencies.
At the moment, this package assumes that the appropriate Perl 5 environment is properly set up prior to installation. Notably, this includes the following modules: - LWP::Simple - Archive::Zip - DBD::mysql
Also, the cache is downloaded seperately and its location is stored in the ENSEMBL_VEP_84_CACHE_DIR environment variable.
